inform.title: Confirm your identity
inform.intro: Next, we need to record a 5 second video of you on this device. You will not need to speak in the video.
inform.explanation: We'll use your video to confirm who you are. We'll do this by comparing your video with the photo your probation officer took when they signed you up. This video will only be used to confirm your identity.
inform.permissionNote: You'll need to accept permissions to record a video on your device.

beforeYouRecord.title: Before you record your video
beforeYouRecord.description: Before you record your video, make sure:
items: you are in a well lit area
you are in front of a plain background
your face is in the frame
you are not wearing a hat or sunglasses

inform.clothingReminder: Remember this is a probation check in and should be treated the same as a face to face meeting. You should wear appropriate clothing when taking the video.

record.title: Record your video
record.countdown: We will start recording in {countdown} seconds

permissionError.title: You need to accept permissions on your device
permissionError.body: We are unable to access your camera to record a video. Check your browser settings and permissions. If you are having trouble using this service, contact your probation officer.

match.title: We have confirmed this is you
match.body: We have confirmed this is you. You can now continue to check your answers.

noMatch.title: We cannot confirm this is you
noMatch.body: We have checked and we cannot confirm this is you. You can try recording again or submit your video anyway.
noMatch.recordAgainTitle: If you record your video again
recordAgainItems: you are in a well lit area
you are in front of a plain background
your face is in the frame
you are not wearing a hat or sunglasses

error.title: We cannot confirm this is you because an error occured
error.body: We have checked and we cannot confirm this is you. You can try recording again.
instructionsItems: you are in a well lit area
you are in front of a plain background
your face is in the frame
you are not wearing a hat or sunglasses
